headline: Cosmetic Dyes Market is Projected with a Value of USD 697.34 million by 2032, Driven by Rapid EV Adoption | Report by SNS Insider
summary: Rising demand for eco-friendly, vibrant cosmetic colors and increased consumer focus on skin-safe, allergen-free dye formulations drive market growth.Austin, July 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Cosmetic Dyes Market Size was valued at USD 468.44 million in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 697.34 million by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 5.11% over the forecast period of 2025-2032.
